left_text: Female with only one hind tibial spur that is large and curved (Fig. 72-2d); vertex strongly concave, as seen from front; hind basitarsus of male with hairy pocket near base of outer surface (Fig. 72-2c)
right_text: Female with two hind tibial spurs; vertex not or scarcely concave; hind basitarsus of male without hairy pocket (Fig. 72-2a, b)
